import React, {useState} from 'react' import {FaRegWindowClose} from "react-icons/fa"; import './Popup.css' function Popup(params) { const showHideClassName = params.active ? "popup active" : "popup hide"; const [city, setCity] = useState(""); const [country, setCountry] = useState(""); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [img, setImg] = useState(""); const [from, setFrom] = useState(""); const [to, setTo] = useState(""); const location = { city: city, country: country, description: description, img: img, from: from, to: to } fetch("http://localhost:3002/locations", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(location) }) return (
setCity(e.target.value)}>
setCountry(e.target.value)}>
) } export default Popup
